name: higgsfield-images
description: Cinematic image generation via Higgsfield AI — Nano Banana Pro (text-to-image, 4K, unlimited on paid plans), Soul (image-to-image, character consistency), inpainting, upscaling, background removal, and 8+ models

costInfo.summary: API: ~$0.23/image (Nano Banana Pro). Web UI subscription cheaper but not usable via API. Segmind alternative: $0.12/image

nano-banana-pro.name: Nano Banana Pro
nano-banana-pro.notes: Unlimited on paid web UI plans only — API charged per call (~$0.23). Best text rendering and physical realism.

soul.name: Higgsfield Soul
soul.notes: Character consistency via Soul ID. Editorial/fashion realism.

watermarkPolicy.paid: No watermark on any paid plan ($9+/month)
watermarkPolicy.notes: No API toggle — automatic based on plan. Cannot retroactively remove from free-tier images.

pricingWarning.apiVsSubscription: Web UI subscription (e.g. $9/mo Basic) does NOT give cheap API rates. API is billed per-call at ~$0.23/image for Nano Banana Pro. Subscription 'unlimited' only applies to web UI usage.
pricingWarning.alternatives: Third-party API proxies (Segmind $0.12/img, APIYI $0.05/img) offer cheaper API access to same models.
